headline: Race for Ohio’s Senate seat: JD Vance
author: fox8webcentral
sentences: FOX 8’s Joe Toohey sat down with author JD Vance to discuss his book “Hillbilly Elegy,” his views on former President Donald Trump and his policies.
FOX 8 previously aired interviews with the other candidates: Mike Gibbons, Matt Dolan, Josh Mandel and Jane Timken.
Rob Portman’s seat got pretty crowded after the longtime politician announced he would not seek another term.
CLEVELAND (WJW)– The race to fill Sen.
